name: singular_user_resources
description: Validates that user resources follow Solace REST API conventions as per ADR

conditions.message: User resources MUST NOT use 'me' as a path parameter (e.g. /api/v2/platform/users/me)
User resources MUST NOT use 'current' as a path parameter (e.g. /api/v2/platform/users/current)
User resources MUST NOT use 'self' as a path parameter (e.g. /api/v2/platform/users/self)
